RelatedSentence: William Simmons , 59 , died in a mobile home fire at 103 Speedy Lane near Gadsden in the Coates Bend community while another person who was in the residence at the time escaped uninjured .
The Alabama Fire Marshal 's Office and Etowah County Arson Task Force are working to conclude how the fire started .
